extendedInfo.description: Apps Forum, an application to share your user experience with other users about all your favorite apps, in real time !You would like to share some useful things you found on a favorite app with your friends on social networks or with other users, Apps Forum is for you !You are playing a nice game and would like to share some experiences in real time with other users, friends or fans of the same game ? Just start or join a live discussion for this game right from Apps Forum !Share passion, knowledge for your favorite apps with this built in social application at your fingertips, a live discussion hub for each one of your apps ! This app is also an app manager to launch/uninstall or see information about a specific app or launch an app at random !Main features:-social : start or join a discussion/chat about each one of your favorite apps, right from the application-See popular apps ofr your installed apps and other users' apps-Manager/organizer : launch your applications (long click) or choose at random, see information or uninstall-Cusomize : manage grid size to fit the layout for your device screen or show all your apps at a glance
